Body: I didn't know that a swipe pattern would mess with TWRP backup and locked myself out of my phone.  In an attempt to get the pattern off, I used the android device manager from Google to erase my phone wirelessly.  Now, having fixed the pattern issue, when I restore my TWRP backup, my phone is instantly erased.  How do I tell Google to stop erasing my phone, or fix the issue otherwise?Nexus 6pMarshmallow 6.0.1 MMB29MRooted
Title: Google keeps erasing phone after TWRP recovery

history.Text: I didn't know that a swipe pattern would mess with TWRP backup and locked myself out of my phone.  In an attempt to get the pattern off, I used the android device manager from Google to erase my phone wirelessly.  Now, having fixed the pattern issue, when I restore my TWRP backup, my phone is instantly erased.  How do I tell Google to stop erasing my phone, or fix the issue otherwise?Nexus 6pMarshmallow 6.0.1 MMB29MRooted
